page.title: 19AUCHTERDERRAN
page.content: In the south west of this ' D ' block is the northern part of the settlement of Auchterderran. This small town is linked to Cardenden which lies to the south of Auchterderran.{Both settlements}have been closely{associated with coal {mining}in the past but, like Kinglassie in the north-east of the ' D ' block,{mining activities have {ceased. } The bulk of Auchterderran which lies within this block is purely {residential,}especially the suburb of Woodend in the north-west of the town. The main public building is {Auchterderran Junior High School } catering for children between the ages of 11/12 and 15/16. Pupils wishing to stay on for 5th and 6th year work have to travel to Beath High School in Cowdenbeath, 5 kilometres away.
